http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2614342/


Awards of the Israeli Film Academy - NOMINATED - Best Film

The deceivingly peaceful Sea of Galilee is the backdrop for this story of violence, hope, and the rebirth of a young man and of the people who love him. White Panther tells of Alex, a young Russian immigrant, whose family falls apart after his father dies while serving in the Israeli army. In retaliation Alex joins a skinhead gang led by his older brother. Portrayed are the young man's attempts to rise above his crime-ridden ghetto life through athletics, set within the context of angry, alienated Russian-Jewish Ã©migrÃ©s disdainful of mainstream Israeli society. Director Danni Reisfeld's first feature, the movie examines issues of culture clash and gang violence among that nation's ever-more-diverse population.
